author: jianhe
msg: YARN-1885. Fixed a bug that RM may not send application-clean-up signal to NMs where the completed applications previously ran in case of RM restart. Contributed by Wangda Tan

author: trawick
msg: Fix bug introduced in r1591508 which resulted in the final empty
FCGI_STDIN not being sent.  Interaction with latest uWSGI (and
probably other protocol implementations) breaks without this.
